summary: The First World War is over. Martins, after many years spent in war abroad, returns to his bride Elza in Latvia. He does not realize that the decisive battle for the heart of Elza and for the newly founded Latvian state is yet to come.
cast: Janis Reinis|Elita Klavina|Girts Krumins|Romualds Ancans|Girts Kesteris|Andris Keiss|Vilis Daudzins|Arturs Skrastins|Kestutis Stasys Jakstas|Gundars Abolins|Ainars Ancevskis|Uldis Anze|Enriko Avots|Juris Bartkevics|Indra Brike|Pauls Butkevics|Gatis Cirulis|Matiss Daudzins|Uldis Dumpis|Peteris Gaudins|Sigita Jevglevska|Aivars Kalnarajs|Juris Kalnins|Elita Klavina-Jacob|Leonarda Klavina-Kestere|Peteris Krilovs|Normunds Laizans|Talivaldis Lasmanis|Ziedonis Lochmelis|Agris Masens|Benjamin Nathan-Serio|Uldis Norenbergs|Guntis Pilsums|Ivars Puga|Ilze Pukinska|Intars Resetins|Juris Rijnieks|Arurs Skrastins|Inara Slucka|Imants Strads|Dainis Sumiskis|Imants Vekmanis|Martins Vilsons
keywords: riga latvia|firearm|battle|place name in title|post world war one
title: Rigas sargi
